director.name: 泰基·萨克匹西特 Taiki Sakpisit

introduction: “Seeing in the Dark”, a moving image installation by Taiki Sakpisit and sound by Jin Matutamtada - explores political and historical sites in Khao Kho, Phetchabun located in the lower northern Thailand. The city planning of Phetchabun was once redesigned for political proposes right around the Siamese Revolution in 1932. What was left behind was the architectural ruin of the People's Party and the remnants of the communist party of Thailand.
